mapper.select: SELECT /* 소속정보 및 권한 얻기 */ CHURCH_CODE, GOD_PEOPLE_NAME, PART_NAME, SELL_NAME, ACCESS_LEVEL, VOLUN_PART_NAME, VOLUN_PART_SELL, ID FROM GOD_PEOPLE_INFO WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT /* 교회정보 셀렉트 */ CHURCH_NAME, CHURCH_IMG_PATH FROM CHURCH_INFO WHERE CHURCH_CODE = #{code}
SELECT /* 소속부서 셀리스트 셀렉트*/ PART_NAME, SELL_NAME, SELL_IMG_PATH FROM SELL_INFO WHERE CHURCH_CODE = #{church_code} AND PART_NAME = #{part_name}
SELECT /* 봉사부서 셀리스트 셀렉트 */ PART_NAME, SELL_NAME, SELL_IMG_PATH FROM SELL_INFO WHERE CHURCH_CODE = #{church_code} AND PART_NAME = #{volun_part_name}
